newsitem.title: JAPAN: JGBs end firmer in Tokyo after two days of losses.
newsitem.headline: JGBs end firmer in Tokyo after two days of losses.

text.p: * JGB futures ended firmer after two days of losses.

* Recovery was supported by positive factors, including accommodative BOJ operation, proposed cuts in government spending, lacklustre stocks and wire service report which said corporate sentiment worsened in May compared with April.
